title: Industry 4.0/5.0-Based Programming Applications: Hybrid Course Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming syntax and understanding of mathematical operations
context.additional_context: Integrating gamification elements to address declining learning motivation post-pandemic. Hybrid design combining VR simulations and online collaboration tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Write three or more Python scripts implementing core technologies of Industry 4.0/5.0.
Solve five or more mathematical modeling problems in a VR simulation environment.
Manage team projects and perform code reviews using GitHub.
Lead four or more programming problem-solving sessions using real-time video collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
